text: @SenTedCruz US politicians have nothing to contribute to their socio-economy. For example, provide solutions to mitigate the COVID-19 risk to American lives, black people discrimination, and so on. The only thing they know what to do is slandering China with all bullshits.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
